price: Mu by’ukuri twaremye umuntu (Adamu) mu ibumba ryumye ukomangaho rikirangira, mu ibumba ry’umukara ryahinduye ibara n’impumuro (kubera igihe ryari rimaze).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūnin
